game_description: Go on an adventure with fire-extinguishing and exploration robot Brutus through a fictional Rotterdam-Rijnmond. There are seven areas currently available: the Moezelweg training grounds, soccer plains in Rotterdam-South, a neighbourhood of terraced houses in Berkel & Rodenrijs, the high-rise of Rotterdam-Centre, a neighbourhood of detached houses on Goeree-Overflakkee and the heavy industry of Botlek/Europoort/Maasvlakte. Explore them and find all finish-orbs.
